entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 5:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers at times heavy in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
